doc.title: The Gene Autry Show

credit.role: Gus, Card Player in Checked Shirt
Music group at Mary's election rally
Derrington's ranch hand wearing white hat
Parker gang Henchman in leather vest
Posse member wearing white hat and vest
Clem Hughes - Chairman, county board of supervisors
Insp. Mary Riley, alias Mary Gridley
Frankie, short ranch hand with accordion
Short cowpoke in leather vest watching fight
Short leather vested Henchman in Kent's gang
Short posse member with first body
Short, cleanshaven townsman at Mary's victory party

Horseman Forcing Adams out of town

doc.plot: The already legendary singing cowboy rode with his comic pal Pat from town to town bringing justice, song and his horse Champion to the old Southwest.
